com.mapdigit.gis.raster

Class MapTileStreamReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.raster.MapTileAbstractReader
      • com.mapdigit.gis.raster.MapTileStreamReader

  • public final class MapTileStreamReader
extends MapTileAbstractReader
    This class is used to store driving directions results

    © Copyright 2010 Guidebee Pty Ltd.

        public int getZoneCount()
        return the count of zones in the map.
        Returns:
        the number of map zones in the map zone collection.

      • insertZone

        public void insertZone(MapTiledZone mapZone,
              int index)
        Inserts the specified map zone to map's zone collection at the specified index. Each map zone in map's zone collection with an index greater or equal to the specified index is shifted upward to have an index one greater than the value it had previously.
        Parameters:
        mapZone - the map zone to insert.
        index - where to insert the new map zone.

      • moveZone

        public void moveZone(int from,
            int to)
        Moves a zone in the Zone collection to change the order in which zones are drawn.
        Parameters:
        from - Index number of the zone to move. The topmost zone is 0.
        to - New location for the zone. For example, if you want it to be the second zone, use 1

      • removeZone

        public void removeZone(MapTiledZone mapZone)
        Remove a map zone from map's zone collection.
        Parameters:
        mapZone - map zone to be removed.

        Remove all map zones from map's zone collection.

      • getImage

        public void getImage(int mtype,
            int x,
            int y,
            int zoomLevel)
        Description copied from class: MapTileAbstractReader
        Get image at given location. when the reader is done, imageArray shall store the image byte array. imageArraySize is the actually data size. isImagevalid indicate the data is valid or not. normally this shall be an async call.
        Specified by:
        getImage in class MapTileAbstractReader
        Parameters:
        mtype - the map type of the map tile.
        x - the x index of the map tile.
        y - the y index of the map tile.
        zoomLevel - the zoom level of the map tile.
